Title: The Dig.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Alan Dean Foster;Sean Clark.
Categories: Interplanetary voyages.
Thumbnail: .
Description: Destined to be a multimedia smash hit, this epic SF story is based on an exciting CD-ROM game created by LucasArts. When a mysterious asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, a space shuttle is sent to "nudge" it into a safe orbit. The three astronauts who venture to the surface find themselves trapped as the asteroid suddenly leaves orbit, transporting them to a strange planet lightyears away..
Published Year: 1997.
Average Rating: 3.4.
